sections.title: Home Office Deductions
sections.content: If a portion of your home is used exclusively for business purposes, you may be eligible for a home office deduction. This deduction allows small business owners to deduct a portion of their home-related expenses, such as mortgage interest, property taxes, utilities, and maintenance costs.

sections.title: Employee Expenses
sections.content: Small businesses can deduct various expenses related to employees, including salaries, wages, bonuses, benefits, and payroll taxes. Additionally, expenses for employee training, travel, and professional development may also be deductible.
